overview: Doing what you want to do is liberating, but unfortunately not many people are able to do that. We spend a life time thinking what consequences our action would bring, how it would affect us in the long run. Most often than not, we think what changes our actions could bring to other people, and we tend to over look what our actions would bring to us. And, in this fear we forget to see that sometimes a little courage, a tiny step can be the foundation of a brighter tomorrow. Sometimes, all we need to give is just one try.
title: Wing One's Way
